import React from 'react' function TodoItems({edit, setEdit,desc,updateTask, keyid,toggleTaskState,index,todoCategories}) { const displayEdit = ()=>{ document.getElementsByClassName[keyid].classlist.remove("hidden") } return ( <>
{toggleTaskState(index,keyid)}}/>
{ setEdit(e.target.value) }} type="text" />
) } export default TodoItems
